Package magellan.plugin.extendedcommands

Class ExtendedCommandsPlugIn

  • java.lang.Object
    • magellan.plugin.extendedcommands.ExtendedCommandsPlugIn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, ShortcutListener, MagellanPlugIn, UnitContainerContextMenuProvider, UnitContextMenuProvider
    public class ExtendedCommandsPlugIn
extends java.lang.Object
implements MagellanPlugIn, UnitContextMenuProvider, UnitContainerContextMenuProvider, java.awt.event.ActionListener, ShortcutListener
    This is a magellan plugin. It makes it possible to save complex commands for single units and load them every time a report is opened. For example: - UnitA creates Wood - UnitB needs Wood for creating something else So, UnitA needs a GIVE command every week but the Vorlage doesn't want to show this command...
    Version:
    1.0, 28.05.2007
    Author:
    Thoralf Rickert
